factory

类 IconCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • factory.IconCreator
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class IconCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    Icon方法的实现类，作用是在指定位置绘制目标矩形 Created by lero on 2020/6/30.
